body_html:
@aabobakr I don't know how your code didn't crash with the init function that you passed.
It should be instead something like

def _init_fn(worker_id):
    np.random.seed(12 + worker_id)

or you can completely ignore the worker_id if you want.
body:
@aabobakr I don't know how your code didn't crash with the init function that you passed.
It should be instead something like
```
def _init_fn(worker_id):
    np.random.seed(12 + worker_id)
```
or you can completely ignore the `worker_id` if you want.
